files.patch:
@@ -177,0 +177,17 @@
+task bots(type: Copy) {
+    doFirst {
+        delete project.rootDir.toString() + '/bots/bin'
+    }
+
+    dependsOn ':bots:cli:images'
+
+    def os = getOS()
+    def cpu = getCPU()
+
+    from zipTree(file(project.rootDir.toString() +
+                      '/bots/cli/build/distributions/cli' +
+                      '-' + project.version + '-' +
+                      os + '-' + cpu + '.zip'))
+    into project.rootDir.toString() + '/bots/bin'
+}
+
